input.sentences: a businessman | rob smith | was presenting his ideas for a new hotel at a business conference .
he proudly held up the sketches he had made of what he though the hotel would look like .
he described in great detail what the hotel would look like and what if would offer guests .
he also touted all the economic benefits it would bring the the strapped town .
he concluded his presentation by thanking his listeners | and he thought his ideas were well received .
output.sentences: the presentation came easy for him.
he was detailed in his description of the plans.
you cant even tell that he needed to go to the bathroom.
despite his growing distraction from his bladder he continued smoothly.
this is someone you want to hire for your sales team.
